title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - Silverstone Motorsport Circuit
description:
In this video we will look at the Silverstone Motorsport Circuit addon which has been released yesterday. It is still work in progress but already looks pretty impressive. During the flight we we fly over the entire circuit and look at the details which have been already added by the developer.

If you also want to give the scenery updates a try download your own copy using the link below:

https://flightsim.to/file/17999/wip-silverstone-motorsport-circuit-uk
